mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORLD_CITY(NAME, COUNTRY_CODE, DISTRICT, POPULATION, LOGIC_DELETE_FLG) VALUES (#{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR2}, #{countryCode,jdbcType=NCHAR}, #{district,jdbcType=NVARCHAR2}, #{population,jdbcType=NUMBER}, #{logicDeleteFlg,jdbcType=NVARCHAR2})
mapper.update:
UPDATE WORLD_CITY CN
CN.NAME = #{name,jdbcType=NVARCHAR2},
CN.COUNTRY_CODE = #{countryCode,jdbcType=NCHAR},
CN.DISTRICT = #{district,jdbcType=NVARCHAR2},
CN.POPULATION = #{population,jdbcType=NUMBER},
WHERE CN.LOGIC_DELETE_FLG = 'visible' AND CN.ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMBER}
